.. SolverLES documentation master file

Welcome to SolverLES’s Documentation
====================================

A modular finite‑volume LES solver for thermal–plasma flows. This site covers:

* How to build and run the code
* Input file format and examples
* Developer architecture & plugin APIs
* Auto-generated C++/Fortran API reference (via Doxygen/Breathe)
